title: Banks struggles to mobilise large deposits; C-D ratio rises to 80 pc: Report
description: Banks in India faced challenges in mobilizing large deposits to meet rising credit demand over the past two financial years. Credit growth outpaced deposit growth, with a notable increase in the Credit-to-Deposit ratio. Younger investors are showing more interest in equity markets, while senior citizens hold a significant portion of term deposits.
